mission_data.playerShipNames_arme: TSN Sabre\TSN Valiant\TSN Lancer\TSN Stalker\TSN Viper\TSN Horizon\TSN Necessity\TSN Hunter

set_ship_text.name: Zarkov Labs
set_ship_text.desc: Center for scientific missions in-system, doubles as gate control.
set_ship_text.scan_desc: The station chief will not shut up about weird conspiracy theories involving wandering planets.
set_ship_text.hailtext: Ming the Merciless is coming for us! He will destroy our planets! I warned them, but nobody would listen.
